id: Florida governor candidate Andrew Gillum supported by TV legend Norman Lear
paragraph: Florida governor candidate Andrew Gillum is being supported by legendary TV producer Norman Lear, who has been campaigning for the Democratic mayor of Tallahassee. Lear tells Joy Reid, ‘I've known Andrew Gillum for 25 years... He's a glorious man.’Nov. 4, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
